###4.3
Starting the Debugger
You can start the Debugger from the command line by typing cvd "executable_name" or from the desktop by dropping an application onto the Debugger icon.
Type: cvd jello at the shell command line.
cvd jello
The Debugger Main View appears with the source code loaded.  
Sorry,you must first type: cvd jello.  Try Again!
Click on the bottom right arrow to continue.
